metadata.title: CVE-2023-46447 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The POPS! Rebel application 5.0 for Android, in POPS! Rebel BluetoothGlucose Monitoring System, sends unencrypted glucose measurements over BLE.

criterions.comment: python-asyncssh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
